name: merchantCancellation
description:
Cancel a booking
**Note**: This service has been replaced by the [cancellationReasons](#operation/cancellationReasons), [bookingQuote](#operation/bookingQuote) and [cancelBooking](#operation/cancelBooking) endpoints

Accept-Language.description: Specifies the language into which the natural-language fields in the response from this service will be translated (see [Accept-Language header](#section/Appendices/Accept-Language-header) for available langage codes)

cancelItems.description: **array** of objects detailing itinerary items to cancel

cancelCode.description:
**cancellation code** that describes the reason for the cancellation
- see: [Suggested cancellation codes](#suggested-cancellation-codes)

cancelDescription.description: **natural-language description** of the reason for cancellation (a reason must be provided if `cancelCode` is `62` or `66`)

distributorItemRef.description: **alphanumeric reference code** of the distributor item

itemId.description: **numeric identifier** of item to cancel in itinerary

distributorRef.description: **itinerary reference identifier** (partner defined) for the booking to cancel

$ul: **errorCodes**: **array** of error codes pertaining to *this* error
**errorMessageText**: **array** of error message strings in plain text
**vmid**: **unique numeric id** of the server that processed *this* request
**errorCodes**: **array** of error codes pertaining to *this* error
**errorMessageText**: **array** of error message strings in plain text
**vmid**: **unique numeric id** of the server that processed *this* request
**cancellationResponseDescription**: **natural-language description** for this response (see response codes table)
**cancellationResponseStatusCode**: **status code** for this response (see response codes table)
**distributorItemRef**: **alphanumeric reference code** of the distributor item
